name: Cluck of War
description:
A short simple Chicken story. Packed with action, music and blades of cluck! 

How to play!

Move & jump around, defeat your enemies and avoid death!

Controls:
  • W - Jump
  • A - Left
  • D - Right 
  • F - Knife Throw
Note: 

There is a hidden area in the game. If you find it, say "Cluck!"
